slide.name: Slide
slide.description: A slide animation component with configurable direction

aspectratio.name: AspectRatio
aspectratio.description: A responsive container that maintains a consistent aspect ratio for its content

button-with-icon.name: ButtonWithIcon
button-with-icon.description: An enhanced button component with icon support, multiple icon positions, and loading states

button-with-spinner.name: ButtonWithSpinner
button-with-spinner.description: A button component with integrated loading spinner that displays during async operations. Automatically adjusts spinner colors based on button variant for optimal visibility.

button-group.name: ButtonGroup
button-group.description: A component that groups multiple buttons together with consistent spacing, clear active states, and responsive wrapping. Supports both single and multiple selection modes.

center.name: Center
center.description: A layout utility component for centering content

pin.name: Pin
pin.description: A layout utility component for Pin content

responsive-grid.name: Responsive Grid
responsive-grid.description: A flexible grid layout component with responsive columns, gaps, equal-height option, and animations (fade, stagger, scale).

auto-grid.name: AutoGrid
auto-grid.description: A self-calculating grid layout that automatically determines columns based on available space and minimum item width, with support for max columns, gap, and balanced heights.

masonry.name: Masonry
masonry.description: A Pinterest-style layout component that arranges items of varying heights in multiple responsive columns, with support for balanced layout and entrance animations.

app-shell.name: AppShell
app-shell.description: A high-level layout component that structures the entire application frame, providing responsive navigation (side, top, or drawer), brand placement, user profile integration, and optional footer support.

fieldGroup.name: FieldGroup
fieldGroup.description: A form utility component that groups related form fields together with an optional label, description, and error message, ensuring consistent spacing and accessibility.

responsive.name: Responsive
responsive.description: A layout component that renders completely different components or layouts depending on the current device breakpoint (mobile, tablet, desktop), enabling fully adaptive user interfaces.

dialogBox.name: DialogBox
dialogBox.description: A dialog-box component with animation and different variants

badge.name: Badge
badge.description: A badge component with animation and different variants

toast.name: Toast
toast.description: A toast notification component with animation and different variants

navbar.name: Navbar
navbar.description: A responsive navigation bar with animation

tabs.name: Tabs
tabs.description: A tab component with animation and different variants

breadcrumbs.name: Breadcrumbs
breadcrumbs.description: A breadcrumb navigation component with animation

sidebar.name: Sidebar
sidebar.description: A collapsible sidebar component with animation

input.name: Input
input.description: An animated input component with different variants

list-basic.name: list-basic
list-basic.description: A flexible list component that supports both unordered (bullet points) and ordered (numbered) lists with consistent spacing between items. Optimized with React.memo, useMemo, and useCallback for performance.

list-with-actions.name: List-With-Actions
list-with-actions.description: A list component that extends ListBasic functionality by adding contextual action buttons (like Edit, Delete, View) to each list item. Actions appear on hover/focus on desktop and remain always visible on mobile. Optimized with React.memo, useMemo, and useCallback for performance.

textarea.name: Textarea
textarea.description: An animated textarea component with different variants

tooltip.name: Tooltip
tooltip.description: An animated tooltip component with different variants

dropdown.name: Dropdown
dropdown.description: An animated dropdown component with different variants

spinner.name: Spinner
spinner.description: An animated spinner component with different variants

spacer.name: Spacer
spacer.description: A utility component that provides adjustable spacing between elements without adding extra visual content.

form.name: Form
form.description: A utility component that provides adjustable spacing between elements without adding extra visual content.

steppers.name: Steppers
steppers.description: An animated steppers component with different variants

table.name: Table
table.description: An animated table component with different variants

pagination.name: Pagination
pagination.description: An animated pagination component with different variants

card.name: Card
card.description: An animated card component with different variants

checkbox.name: Checkbox
checkbox.description: An animated checkbox component with different variants and animation options

radio.name: Radio
radio.description: An animated radio component with different variants and animation options

typography.name: Typography
typography.description: A Typography component for consistent text styling with various variants, sizes, weights, and colors.

container.name: Container
container.description: A flexible container component for constraining content width with responsive padding and centering options.

section.name: Section
section.description: A layout component for creating distinct vertical blocks with consistent vertical rhythm, spacing, and background styling.

cluster.name: Cluster
cluster.description: A layout component for creating distinct group related items with consistent spacing and alignment.

breakpoint.name: Breakpoint
breakpoint.description: A flexible container component for constraining content width with responsive padding and centering options.

stack.name: Stack
stack.description: A layout component for arranging elements in a stack with adjustable spacing and alignment.

DebugBox.name: DebugBox
DebugBox.description: A development utility that overlays grid, spacing, breakpoints, and dimensions for debugging layouts.

header-layout.name: HeaderLayout
header-layout.description: A flexible layout component with header, sidebar, and footer that supports responsive design and various configuration options.

drawer.name: Drawer
drawer.description: A drawer component with animation and different variants

lazyload.name: Lazyload
lazyload.description: A layout component for lazy loading...

singlecolumnlayout.name: SingleColumnLayout
singlecolumnlayout.description: A clean, responsive single-column layout with header, constrained content area, and footer. Supports multiple theme variants and animations.

sidebarleftlayout.name: SidebarLeftLayout
sidebarleftlayout.description: A flexible layout component with header, sidebar, and footer that supports responsive design and various configuration options.

sidebarrightlayout.name: SidebarRightLayout
sidebarrightlayout.description: A flexible layout component with header, right sidebar, and footer that supports responsive design and various configuration options.

fullheightsidebarlayout.name: FullHeightSidebarLayout
fullheightsidebarlayout.description: A flexible layout component with header, sidebar that supports app dashboard with responsive design.

responsivegridlayout.name: ResponsiveGridLayout
responsivegridlayout.description: A responsive grid layout template for CLI dashboards, combining a header, footer, and auto-flowing cards that adapt across breakpoints.

threeColumnSidebar.name: ThreeColumnSidebar
threeColumnSidebar.description: A flexible layout component with header, sidebar that supports app dashboard with responsive design.

threecolumnsidebarlayout.name: ThreeColumnSidebarLayout
threecolumnsidebarlayout.description: A flexible layout component with header, sidebar that supports app dashboard with responsive design.

forgotPassword.name: forgotPassword
forgotPassword.description: A fully responsive and customizable Forgot Password component with an input field and submit button, built to support secure in-app password reset processes.

signin.name: SignIn
signin.description: A sign-in page template with responsive design and form validation.

signup.name: SignUp
signup.description: A sign-up page template with responsive design and form validation.

avatar.name: Avatar
avatar.description: An avatar component with image, icon, letters, and status indicator support, along with fallback handling and customizable sizes and shapes.

otpVerification.name: otpVerification
otpVerification.description: A fully responsive OTP (One-Time Password) verification component that provides configurable input length, animations, themes, auto-focus behavior, and paste-to-autofill support.

resetPassword.name: ResetPassword
resetPassword.description: A reset password page template with responsive design and form validation.

settingPage.name: SettingsPage
settingPage.description: A settings page template with responsive design and animation.

twoFactorAuthSetup.name: TwoFactorAuthSetup
twoFactorAuthSetup.description: A two-factor authentication setup page with QR code, manual entry, backup codes, and verification step.

profile.name: Profile
profile.description: A profile page template with responsive design and form validation.

pricingGrid.name: PricingGrid
pricingGrid.description: A pricing grid template with responsive design.

securityPage.name: SecurityPage
securityPage.description: A comprehensive account security page with password change, active sessions, logout-all, two-factor authentication toggle with recovery codes, and login activity, available in both grid and collapsible list layouts.

notificationSettings.name: NotificationSettingsPage
notificationSettings.description: A notification settings page with email, SMS, and push notification preferences, featuring toggles and category grouping.

api-keys.name: api-keys
api-keys.description: A page for managing API keys with responsive design and form validation.

fileUpload.name: fileUpload
fileUpload.description: A file uploader component with responsive design and form validation.

datePicker.name: datePicker
datePicker.description: A date picker component with responsive design and form validation.
